name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: An easy breakfast put together in minutes. Make it up to two days in advance; top with nuts or seeds prior to serving.

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or any sweet dip, your choice

preparation: Mix together yogurt and dip mix.
Alternately layer with berries and nuts in tall glasses and serve.
tips: Make it vegan: Substitute blended silken tofu in place of Greek yogurt.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice toast and 1 tsp nut butter.
